snippet: Dwight Howard, Pau Gasol and Jordan Hill will miss the Lakers’ road trip with injuries, leaving the team without its top three big men indefinitely.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Lakers centers Dwight Howard, Pau Gasol and Jordan Hill will miss four upcoming road games with injuries; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard, Pau Gasol and Jordan Hill will miss the Lakers’ road trip with injuries, leaving the team without its top three big men indefinitely.
